title: Dumbbell flyes
subtitle: A chest exercise that targets the pectoral muscles by horizontally extending the arms with dumbbells.

title: Bicycle crunches
subtitle: An abdominal exercise that involves alternating knee-to-elbow movements to engage the core muscles and obliques.

title: Shoulder press
subtitle: A strength-training exercise that focuses on the shoulder muscles by pressing dumbbells or a barbell overhead.

title: Renegade rows
subtitle: A compound exercise that combines a plank position with alternating rows using dumbbells, targeting the back, core, and arms.

title: Yoga
subtitle: A mind-body practice that incorporates physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation, promoting flexibility, strength, relaxation, and overall well-being.
